items.description: River Windrush from Bourton to Newbridge
items.message:
Property flooding is not currently expected. 

River levels remain high, but are falling slowly, on the River Windrush. Therefore, flooding of low lying land and roads is possible today, 6/11/24, in the Bourton on the Water area. 

The forecast today is cloudy but dry, and the weather should remain dry for most of this week. We expect river levels to continue falling, but levels remain sensitive to rainfall. We are monitoring the situation. Go to the 'River and Sea levels in England' webpage for current river levels. This message will be updated by tomorrow morning, 7/11/24, or as the situation changes.
